reviews.review: Играл в дбд с 18 года на другом аккаунте наиграл около 300 часов, всё нравилось. После переработки матчмейкинга играть больше не хочется. На основе где первые ранги попадаются 20-тки и можно сказать что я бью детей. Создал этот акк-ситуация повернулась наоборот на 20-том ранге за убийцу попадается тима 1-ых рангов, а аккаунт то не прокачан... Вообщем сейчас игру не рекомендую. Дополняю: поиграл 7 часов и что то произошло, а точнее стали попадаться нормальные ранги. Но игру всё равно не рекомендую.
Fking stupid and noob matchmaking system, rank 20 meet rank 1?
Jogo mais jogado por Incels em toda Steam. NOTA 9/10. 10/10 se fizer o killer dar DC.

Игра очень понравилась. С друзьями можно весело провести время.
Плюсы:
* Динамичная 
* Интересные персонажи 
* Хорошая графика 
Минусы: 
* Некоторые персонажи (особенно маньяки) имба полная
* Игра явно не стоит своих 500р. 
* Нету никакого баланса в игре. Только начала играть, а уже кидает к людям, у которых 1-5 ранг и прокаченный персонаж.

FIX THE MATCHMAKING!

Al principio es un juego divertido, haces generadores, corres del killer, ganas tiempo para que tus compañeros terminen los gens etc etc
El concepto es divertido pero una vez le dedicas su tiempo y vas entendiendo el meta, el juego cambia totalmente, deja de ser ese juego en el que tenemos que escondernos del killer y empezas a jugar con una mentalidad de rushear generadores y ver como abusar de las mecanicas del juego para poder escapar.
No esta nada mal para jugar con amigos, además de que no vas a encontrar otro juego como este en el mercado que tenga la misma calidad y misma tematica, aparte siempre esta baratito en las ofertas.

Matchmaking is utter shit. Every game I've played was unfair, with my friends and I as rank 18-20 survivors being matched with literally rank 1 killers. Stay away until the devs fix the dumbest and shittiest matchmaking I've ever played with. How little of an IQ do you have to match literal beginners with experienced rank 1s?

저티어에서 놀 땐 마냥 재미있지만 한자리수 고티어로 넘어가면 살인마를 하는 순간 생존마들한테 농락만 엄청 당하다가 스트레스 받아서 끄게될 수 있다. 생존자를 한 다면 스트레스가 해소될 수 있긴 하지만... 또 빡센 세팅 살인마나 버그걸리면 멘탈 부숴진다.
게임 자체는 정말 훌륭하고 재미있지만, 중국인들은 한 번만 갈고리에 걸려도 강종해버리고, 핵은 뭐 중국인 패시브로 있고... 다인큐로 플레이 하는게 정신건강에 이로울 수 있음. 고티어는 상관 없는데 랭크가 섞이거나 애매하게 잡히면 그냥 사람 살리거나 커버도 안해주고 지들끼리 발전기 돌리고 죽게 놔두고 가관임.
그리고 지금까지 살면서 플레이 해 본 게임중에 버그가 제일 많음 ㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋ 지금도 안고쳐진 버그가 한 20개는 넘는 듯

걍 살인마 핑 망게임 살인마가 막 순간이동 하면서 때려지고, 판자 내렸는데 뚫고 처 맞고, 벽에 끼고, 데드하드는 안 써지고 진짜 역대급 스트레스 유발 망겜임 ㄹㅇ
걍 오래 할 생각 하지 말고 애들이랑 저랭에서 놀 생각으로 하세요 ㅎㅎ
Buen juego, vale la pena comprarlo, pero también es cierto que tiene algunos bugs medios rancios a veces, sobre todo a la hora de emparejar y buscar partidas.

I bought this game on July 16, 2016 right after it was released. I am writing this review over 4 years later.

When it was first released, there were only a select few survivors and killers. The game was absolutely awesome. There was no DLC or any micro transactions, just a simple and fun as hell game. But now there are so many DLC characters that are so unbelievably OP that the game simply just isn't fun to play in public matches anymore. Don't get me wrong because it is still a great game; in the rare event that you actually get to play a match only with a full crew of OG survivors and and an OG killer. 

Yes I still play the game, but only for two or three rounds because the way the game works now is not the same as it once was. I'm not butthurt about the newer characters because I'm all about diversity. I'm butthurt because survivors should be able to run away from killers, the way it used to be. I just can't stand to be outran/outgunned by purchased DLC.

If Behaviour fixed the BS and reworked the game mechanics to be the way they were back in 2016, I would change my mind. Until then, the game is not worth buying unless you have 4 friends who are willing to play the game privately in its original form with no OP DLC crap.

Cool game, can't recommend. Matchmaking system is horrible, devs just match the first six players they find regardless of rank. I frequently find myself up against players with hundreds of hours of experience. If they fix matchmaking, try the game, but until then it's not worth your money.
遊戲配對機制不太公平，R20(最低階) 常常跟 R2 R1(最高階) 的配在一起，就像是一個銅牌的鬼要去追四個鑽石/大師的人，完全沒有遊戲體驗可言，感覺很差。

its fun but almost all the killers are way overpowered its almost unfair half the the time. especially the doctor. his ability is spammed way too much and it makes you want to throw the match immediately when people spam it as killer. Killer-sided heavily, Survivor? not so much.

Tenho o jogo desde 2017 e fiquei muito tempo sem jogar com medo, comecei a recentemente com os amigos a jogar mais e o jogo é absurdo de bom. Recomendadíssimo.

Expect a VERY high learning curve, no matter which side you play. The matchmaking doesn't prioritize anything, so more often than not high ranks will get matched with low ranks, and it almost always leads to one sided matches. It's very hard to improve. If you want to play and enjoy yourself either bring friends and don't expect much or expect to put a lot of time into the game so you have a chance to win. (I have about five hours logged and have won ONE match) I know I don't have much experience but it's disheartening to lose so hard so often.

Dead By Daylight es un juego Unico, divertido. La tematica 4 vs 1 killer es maravillosa y macabra, saca hartos sustos y solo el trabajo en equipo te servirán para poder escapar con vida de las garras de ese asesino. Buena suerte~!
